name: wolPi
tagline: Android App for Wake-on-Lan via SSH (e.g. Raspberry Pi, Debian-based remote machines)
body:
# "My stupid router is blocking the broadcast IP!"

Yes, mine too. So I am using a Raspberry Pi as a proxy
to send my magic packet call.

This is a convenience app, providing a one-click WOL call
(via SSH and the 'wakeonlan' module).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
